title: Onye na-eme ngagharị iwe ajago Donald Trump flagụ mba Rọshịa
sentences: Otu nwoke onye mba Amerịka na-eme ngagharị iwe nọrọ n’isi obodo Amerịka bụ Washington, taa bụ abalị iri abụọ na anọ nke ọnwa Ọkụtoba, kpọọ oku n’olu ike ka e kpee onye isi ala mba Amerịka ikpe maka inyere ndị Rọshịa aka n’igwu ojoro n’oge atụm vootu Amerịka gara aga
Nwoke ahụ aha ya bụ Ryan Clayton chebiri Trump n’ogige Capitol Hill, ụlọ ọrụ ndị omebe iwu nke mba Amerịka
Mgbe Trump na onye isi oche Sineti Amerịka, bụ Mitch McConnell, na-agafe, Ryan chịịrị flagụ ndị mba Rọshịa na-aja Trump
Ka ọ na-eme nke a, ọ saghepukwere ọnụ ya malite tiwe mkpu n’oke olu
Ọ na-ekwu n’olu bekee Trump is treason!, nke pụtara na Trump bụ onye arụrụala n’olu Igbo
Ụnụ ga-echete na a na-ebo Trump na ndị otu ya ebubo na ya na ndị Rọshịa gbakọrọ aka were gwuo ojoro mere Trump jiri merie Hillary Clinton na ntuli aka ahụ e mere na mba Amerịka n’afọ gara aga
Kamgbe ahụ ndị Amerịka mechara nhọpụta onye isi ala, ndị Amerịka ka na-eme nyocha
E mechara họpụta onye ọkaikpe pụrụ ịche, bụ Robert Mueller, onye ka na-eme nyocha maka nrụrụ aka ahụ a na-eme Trump na ndị Rọshịa ebubo ya
